name: Age of Talisman
summary:
We are a 100% Free to Play MMORPG based on a Chinese world that has been taken over by monsters and needs your help. 

We have 5 classes and many online players to battle in guild wars. 
Our classes have some magic and strength but you decide on what to pick!
We have a lot of great items and quest and more coming soon!

Feel the need to play a great MMO and enjoy gaming while doing it give us a try today.
